short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of scrolling through hundreds of Github issue comments to find that one magical response? Skip the scroll is here to help!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Skip the scroll is a simple chrome extension that sorts Github issue comments and provides an intuitive interface to iterate through them based on their social reactions. 

Skip the scroll is entirely open source and under a MIT license. 
https://github.com/henryjeff/skip-the-scroll


Maintained and Created by Henry Heffernan
